name: Church
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The church is filled with the solemn scent of incense and the soft glow of candlelight. The sound of hymns and the gentle murmur of prayers creates an atmosphere of reverence and community. High ceilings and stained glass windows create a sense of awe, while the air carries the weight of faith and tradition.
